Previously, I was a graduate student at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) (where I obtained my PhD under the supervision of Prof. Madhu Sudan), a postdoc at Microsoft Research-Silicon Valley, and a research assistant professor at the Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago.
